title: The Solus Project (v2.10.0.13) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_the_solus_project_2.10.0.13.exe"
- Play

Changelog for Patch 1.21 / GOG-13 (added 08th August 2016): 
In VR, presumed fix for spawning way up in the air or below the level on reloading a save game/level. 
In non VR, fix for gamepad not receiving focus on the explorer diary menu. 

Genre: Adventure - Simulation - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English. Text only: ÄeskÃ½, Dansk, Deutsch, franÃ§ais, italiano, polski, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, svenska
Features: single-player - achievements
Released: June 7, 2016
Size: 3.8 GB
Company: Grip Games/Teotl Studios / Teotl Studios
Included goodies: wallpapers + avatar
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/the_solus_project

About: 
A single player exploration driven adventure with survival elements, set on a mysterious and seemingly uninhabited alien planet. Survive through exploration, and unlock the mysteries of Gliese-6143-C.

From the creators of "Unmechanical" and successor to "The Ball".

Adventure - Be a pioneer, an archaeologist, and an astronaut to explore a mysterious alien planet. The adventure has a beginning and an end, but it is a harsh world. A mistake will cost you your life.
Explore - Unlock the depths of the uncharted planet, and discover the secrets buried deep below. Delve into huge cave systems and tombs and uncover over 200 secrets.
Survive - Survive the extreme climate, tornadoes, storms, meteors, lightning, and not least the dark secrets buried beneath the surface.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10 64 bit only 
Processor: Dual Core 2GHZ+
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible Card - GeForce 460 or equivalent and higher strongly recommended 
DirectX: Version 10 
Storage: 10 GB available space
Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card 
Mouse, Keyboard

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10 64 bit only 
Processor: Quad Core 2GHZ+
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GeForce 760 or equivalent and higher
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 10 GB available space
Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card 
Mouse, Keyboard
